properties.description: Each parameter in this data flow is defined as 'start position', 'offset' as in '1,7'.

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Sno as string ('1,1'),
	Name as string ('2,5'),
	Age as string ('7,2'),
	TwitterFollowers as string ('9,5')
}
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> fixedsource1
fixedsource1 derive(Sno = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($Sno,',')[1]),toInteger(split($Sno,',')[2])),
		Name = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($Name,',')[1]),toInteger(split($Name,',')[2])),
		Age = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($Age,',')[1]),toInteger(split($Age,',')[2])),
		Followers = substring(Column_1,toInteger(split($TwitterFollowers,',')[1]),toInteger(split($TwitterFollowers,',')[2])),
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> MapFields
MapFields sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['mysinglefile.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
